accuracy.description: The precision of the answer provided in relation to the question asked.

completeness.description: The answer should address all parts of the question.

relevance.description: The information provided in the answer must be relevant to the question.

source_reliability.description: The reliability of sources used to gather information for the answer.

reasoning_traceability.description: The ability to follow the logical steps or reasoning the agent took to arrive at the answer.

steps_efficiency.description: The number of steps taken to answer the question relative to the expected number for efficient problem-solving.

diversity_of_steps.description: Variety and difference in the nature of steps taken to ensure a wide coverage and prevent brute forcing.

answer_presentation.description: Clarity and coherence in the way the answer is presented.

data_contamination_prevention.description: Measures taken to ensure that the answer is not a result of data contamination, i.e., it does not come from plain text found on the internet.
